availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. M. Coffee (Ballard Co, Ky, attorney and prov govt)

body.p: Blandville, Kentucky, attorney and provisional government convention member. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth A. Coffee. Father of Eugene S. Coffee, Isaac N. Coffee, Luella Coffee, Sally L. Coffee, Willie O. Coffee. Attorney in Blandville, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 278A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, McCuistians District, p. 742.
